articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: 'I believe you can do anything in life'
articles.description: BBC Indian Sportswoman of the Year nominee PV Sindhu says her self-belief and passion for badminton have been key ingredients to her success.
articles.content:
Badminton player PV Sindhu made history by becoming the first Indian woman to win two Olympic medals.
The 26-year old, who followed her silver medal from Rio with a bronze in Tokyo, says the huge su… [+405 chars]

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Google made a smart lamp that you’ll probably never be able to buy
articles.description: Google has created an Assistant-supported smart lamp, but it’s only available for its employees. The lamp sports a sleek white design with a cylindrical light and built-in lighting presets.
articles.content:
Its reserved for employees only
The dLight comes with built-in support for the Google Assistant.
Image by Google via Ben Gold
If youre in the market for a Google Assistant-supported smart lamp, yo… [+1819 chars]
